system.description: Your comrade provides invaluable assistance during the heat of battle, helping to keep your weapons loaded and firing.
system.benefit: Comrade in Cohesion assists in reloading the character's currently equipped weapon. This can be used in combination with the character's own actions. For example, if a weapon requires 2 Full Actions to reload, both the character and Comrade can use their Full Action to reload it in 1 Turn.

specialAbilities.name: Assisted Reload
specialAbilities.description: Your comrade can assist in reloading your weapon. Their reload action stacks with yours, allowing you to reload weapons faster. For example, a weapon requiring 2 Full Actions to reload can be reloaded in 1 Turn if both you and your Comrade use your Full Actions.
